channel.title: Commands for admins and for regular players
channel.description: I want a new admin script or something i have the same one that came with testscape anyone know what i should search or can you tell me Also i want more commands for regular people what should i search

item.title: Commands for admins and for regular players
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

to make commands for non admins, just put

&& playerRights >= 0

after the command name like after (“pass”) [right here]) at least thats how u do it on testscape source.

Read full topic
